meanings.definition: Acting to regulate or control the immune response.
meanings.sent1: The immunoregulatory treatment helped balance my immune system.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an immunoregulatory medication to manage my immune response.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a tiny pill could be so immunoregulatory!
meanings.sent4: Her soothing voice had an immunoregulatory effect on my anxious mind.
meanings.sent5: The immunoregulatory therapy was like a gentle conductor orchestrating my immune orchestra.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the regulation of the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunoregulatory proteins play a crucial role in immune system balance.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the immunoregulatory mechanisms of the body's defense system.
meanings.sent3: The immunoregulatory concept may sound complex, but it's all about immune system harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an immunoregulatory power, calming everyone around her like a shield.
meanings.sent5: The immunoregulatory function of the body is like a traffic controller directing immune responses.
